data.question: What is the empirical formula of [Ni(qt)2]?
At what temperature does [Ni(qt)2] melt according to the DSC curve?
What crystal system does [Ni(qt)2] belong to?
Is the [Ni(qt)2] crystal stable at 190 °C according to TGA-DSC measurements?
What method was used to observe the morphology of many organic compound films?
What does the AFM study reveal about the [Ni(qt)2] films during heating?
data.answer: The films were composed of many distinguishable particles on the surface, with a size of several hundred nanometers.

data.question: Did the nanoparticles ([Ni(qt)2] NPs) show long-range migration on the SiO2 substrate before crystallization?
What was the annealing temperature used for the AFM peak force error images in Movie S3?
Does the crystal growth mechanism of [Ni(qt)2] involve oriented attachment of activated NPs?
What was the purpose of using a hot-stage microscope in the study?
data.answer: To perform thermo-microscopic investigations by heating samples and observing the process.

data.question: Was vapor transport mechanism involved in the crystallization process of [Ni(qt)2]?
What does the appearance of an endothermic peak at 359 °C in the DSC curve indicate?
Was the [Ni(qt)2] crystal observed to be unstable under long time electron beam radiation in high-resolution mode?
What was the base pressure in the vacuum chamber during the deposition of [Ni(qt)2] thin films?
Did the study provide experimental evidence for NP-mediated non-classical growth mechanism in organic materials?
data.answer: No, the study focused on [Ni(qt)2] and did not provide direct evidence for all organic materials.

data.question: Is the [Ni(qt)2] film's crystalline phase different when deposited on SiO2 substrates compared to bulk crystals?
What does the migration of [Ni(qt)2] nanoparticles on the substrate suggest about the crystal growth process?
data.answer: It suggests a non-classical pathway in the growth of the molecular crystal.

data.question: Was the [Ni(qt)2] powder sample stable at 190 °C for 6 hours under flowing nitrogen gas?
What was the scanning rate used in the AFM studies of [Ni(qt)2] crystallization?
Does the study suggest that understanding the crystallization mechanisms of [Ni(qt)2] can aid in the design of molecular materials?
